item.title: Workshop Announcements 2019/20
item.description: I am proud to announce three workshops that I am going to lead/teach in autumn 2019 and spring 2020! ðŸŽ‰ Thanks to all of you for that opportunity! â†’ Data Visualization Workshop in Berlin, Germany (Sep 26th 2019) â†’ Data Exploration in R with tidyverse in Modica, Italy (Nov 4th to 8th 2019) â†’ Data Visualization in R with ggplot2 in Berlin, Germany (Mar 2nd to 6th 2020) “Data Visualization” Workshop in Berlin (September 2019) I am delighted to be one of the invited workshop host during the 2-day PhD symposium (September 26th and 27th 2019) at my home affiliation IZW (Leibniz Institute for Zoo and Wildlife Research).
